interfaces

Interface PlaygroundInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Playground

    public interface PlaygroundInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Operational interface of a remote object of type PlaygroundInterface. It provides the functionality to access the Playground.

    • Method Summary

      int informReferee(int coachID)
      Operation informReferee It is called by coaches to inform the referee that the teams are ready to proceed the trial only starts when the last coach informs the referee
      int reviewNotes(int coachID)
      It is called by the coaches to review the notes after the trial decision has been made by the referee

      Operation server shutdown.
      int startTrial()

       throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getReady

        int getReady(int contestantID,
             int strenght)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation GetReady It is called by Players to get ready if they are selected to play the trial. They wait until Trial is started. The players notify the coaches that they are ready.
        Parameters:
        contestantID - identification of the contestant
        strenght - strength of the contestants
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

      • informReferee

        int informReferee(int coachID)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation informReferee It is called by coaches to inform the referee that the teams are ready to proceed the trial only starts when the last coach informs the referee
        Parameters:
        coachID - identification of the coach
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails
